stories.original_headline: Intermittent fasting fails to beat standard dieting for weight loss
stories.original_summary: Intermittent fasting has become one of the most talked-about weight loss trends in recent years, promising dramatic results with simple changes to when you eat. But a major Cochrane review suggests the reality may be far less exciting. After analyzing 22 clinical trials involving nearly 2,000 adults
stories.fantasy_headline: New Eating Charm Not as Powerful as Old Ways!
stories.fantasy_story: The Wizards' Council recently reviewed a popular new eating charm meant to banish extra girth. It promised quick results by altering meal times. However, after careful study, the council found it no more effective than traditional herbal remedies for shedding unwanted pounds.

stories.original_headline: Mark Zuckerberg and his Ray-Ban entourage have their day in court
stories.original_summary: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg entered a downtown Los Angeles courthouse in largely the same way as all the attorneys, reporters, and advocates who'd come to watch his landmark trial testimony, but with one notable difference: he was flanked by an entourage that appeared to be wearing Meta's Ray-Ban smart
stories.fantasy_headline: Arch-Baron Zark Attends Tribunal with Enchanted Retinue
stories.fantasy_story: Arch-Baron Zark, leader of the Scrying Glass Guild, appeared before the Royal Tribunal today. He arrived much like other attendees, but with a unique retinue. His guards all wore the guild's newest enchanted spectacles, allowing them to perceive hidden truths.
